recommendations: Gaurav Karmarkar “I had the pleasure to work with Inayath for two years on data intelligence topics at noon. Inayath is an incredibly innovative and talented data scientist who has a very pragmatic and efficient approach to problem-solving solutions. He has been instrumental in the successful launch of a real-time price elasticity model for Private Label Brands at Noon. We worked together closely on the execution of multiple high-impact projects, where was able to build, test and improvise. Inayath, during his tenure at Noon interacted and supported the data requirements for 7+ teams and multiple stakeholders. I highly recommend Inayath for his sharp intellect and learning agility.”

Ezequiel M. “Inayath is an exceptional Data Scientist, demonstrating a profound commitment to the field of data analytics. His analytical prowess and dedication to extracting valuable insights make him a standout professional in the industry. Inayath's expertise in handling complex data sets is matched only by his unwavering commitment to delivering high-quality results.”
